com.immersion.uhl
Interface EffectHandle

public interface EffectHandle

Encapsulates an effect handle.

Method Detail

modifyPlayingMagSweepEffect

void modifyPlayingMagSweepEffect(MagSweepEffectDefinition definition)
Modifies this playing MagSweep effect.

Parameters:
definition - Definition of the effect parameters.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
One or more of the arguments is invalid; for example,
  • The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
  • The value of one or more of the effect parameters is invalid.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error modifying this effect.
"VIBE_E_INCOMPATIBLE_EFFECT_TYPE"
This effect handle does not represent a MagSweep effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

appendWaveformEffect

void appendWaveformEffect(WaveformEffectDefinition definition)
Appends PCM data to this playing Waveform effect.

If this Waveform effect is no longer playing, this method starts playing a new Waveform effect and is equivalent to Device.playWaveformEffect.

This function is supported only in the 5000 API edition. To get the API edition level, call Device.getCapabilityInt32 with the ImmVibe.VIBE_DEVCAPTYPE_EDITION_LEVEL device capability type.

Parameters:
definition - Definition of the effect parameters containing the PCM data to append. The sample rate and bit depth specified in the effect parameters must be the same as the values passed to Device.playWaveformEffect to play the effect. There may be a performance penalty when specifying a different magnitude from the value that was passed to Device.playWaveformEffect to play the Waveform effect.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
One or more of the arguments is invalid; for example,
  • The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
  • The value of one or more of the effect parameters is invalid.
  • The sample rate or bit depth specified in the effect parameters does not match the value that was passed to Device.playWaveformEffect to play the effect.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error appending PCM data to the effect.
"VIBE_E_INCOMPATIBLE_EFFECT_TYPE"
This effect is not a Waveform effect.
"VIBE_E_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY"
The API cannot allocate memory to complete the request. This happens when the system runs low in memory.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.
"VIBE_E_NOT_SUPPORTED"
This function is not supported in the 3000 and 4000 API editions. To get the API edition level, call Device.getDeviceCapabilityInt32 with the Device#VIBE_DEVCAPTYPE_EDITION_LEVEL device capability type.

getState

int getState()
Retrieves the status of this effect; whether playing, not playing, or paused.

Returns:
Status of this effect. The effect status is one of ImmVibe.VIBE_EFFECT_STATE_NOT_PLAYING, ImmVibe.VIBE_EFFECT_STATE_PLAYING, or ImmVibe.VIBE_EFFECT_STATE_PAUSED.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error getting the status of this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

isPlaying

boolean isPlaying()
Gets whether this effect is playing.

Returns:
true if this effect is playing, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error getting the status of this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

boolean isPaused()
Gets whether this effect is paused.

Returns:
true if this effect is paused, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error getting the status of this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

pause

void pause()
Pauses this playing effect.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
One or more of the arguments is invalid; for example,
  • The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
  • This effect is no longer playing.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error pausing this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

resume

void resume()
Resumes this paused effect from the point where it was paused.

Depending on how many effects are already playing, it is possible that some simple effects from a paused Timeline effect or Streaming effect could not be resumed. This method will not throw an exception when it cannot resume all of the simple effects.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error resuming this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

stop

void stop()
Stops this playing or paused effect.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error stopping this effect.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

playStreamingSample

void playStreamingSample(byte[] streamingSample,
                         int size)
Plays a Streaming Sample.

Parameters:
streamingSample - Streaming Sample data.
size - Streaming Sample data size in bytes. The size must be greater than zero and less than or equal to ImmVibe.VIBE_MAX_STREAMING_SAMPLE_SIZE. The size of the data may be less than the length of the streamingSample buffer if the same buffer is used to store different Streaming Samples of different sizes.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
One or more of the arguments is invalid; for example,
  • The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
  • This effect handle does not represent a Streaming effect.
  • The size parameter less than or equal to zero or greater than ImmVibe.VIBE_MAX_STREAMING_SAMPLE_SIZE.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error playing the Streaming Sample.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

playStreamingSampleWithOffset

void playStreamingSampleWithOffset(byte[] streamingSample,
                                   int size,
                                   int offsetTime)
Plays a Streaming Sample with a time offset.

Parameters:
streamingSample - Streaming Sample data.
size - Streaming Sample data size in bytes. The size must be greater than zero and less than or equal to ImmVibe.VIBE_MAX_STREAMING_SAMPLE_SIZE. The size of the data may be less than the length of the streamingSample buffer if the same buffer is used to store different Streaming Samples of different sizes.
offsetTime - For offsetTime values that are greater than zero, playback is delayed for offsetTime in milliseconds. For offsetTime values that are less than zero, sample playback begins in offset time in milliseconds into the Streaming Sample.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - The detail message of the exception may consist of the following values:
"VIBE_E_INVALID_ARGUMENT"
One or more of the arguments is invalid; for example,
  • The device has been closed by a previous call to Device.close.
  • This effect handle does not represent a Streaming effect.
  • The size parameter less than or equal to zero or greater than ImmVibe.VIBE_MAX_STREAMING_SAMPLE_SIZE.
"VIBE_E_FAIL"
Error playing the Streaming Sample.
"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.

"VIBE_E_INCOMPATIBLE_EFFECT_TYPE"

"VIBE_E_SERVICE_BUSY"
The Player Service is busy and could not complete the request.
